snippet: British legislators want to know whether Robert E. Diamond, Jr. will get up to $30 million after being forced out of Barclays Bank and say they will not allow him to implicate the Bank of England in the widening scandal.
abstract: British legislators want to know whether Robert E. Diamond, Jr. will get up to $30 million after being forced out of Barclays Bank and say they will not allow him to implicate the Bank of England in the widening scandal.

headline.main: Braying for Diamond -- and his $30 Million
